snippet: A U.S. lawyer on Tuesday appealed a federal judge's ruling that he used fraud to secure a multibillion-dollar pollution judgment against Chevron Corp in Ecuador, a decision that bars him from collecting a $9.5 billion award in the United States....

headline.print_headline: Lawyer Appeals Ruling That Blocks U.S. Collection of Award in Chevron Ecuador Case
headline.main: Lawyer Appeals Ruling That Blocks U.S. Collection of Award in Chevron Ecuador Case

lead_paragraph: A U.S. lawyer on Tuesday appealed a federal judge's ruling that he used fraud to secure a multibillion-dollar pollution judgment against Chevron Corp in Ecuador, a decision that bars him from collecting a $9.5 billion award in the United States.
